getInitialClassification

public abstract Classification getInitialClassification(int valuesPerFrame)
                                                 throws java.lang.Exception
Returns the initial classification array for this dataset.

Selects valuesPerFrame randomly chosen pixels from the dataset. This is done by classifying the value to -1 (out of bag).

Parameters:
valuesPerFrame -
